snippet: The laser attack weapon has been shown in tests to disable patrol boats and blind or destroy surveillance drones.
abstract: United States Navy announces that it is deploying for first time laser attack weapon in Persian Gulf; prototype shipboard laser has been shown in tests to disable patrol boats and blind or destroy surveillance drones; announcement seems meant as warning to Iran.
lead_paragraph: The laser attack weapon has been shown in tests to disable patrol boats and blind or destroy surveillance drones.

headline.seo: Navy Deploying Laser Weapon Prototype in Persian Gulf
headline.main: Navy Deploying Laser Weapon Prototype Near Iran
headline.print_headline: Navy to Deploy Laser Weapon In Persian Gulf
